line_1: Feeds on, in midst of Plenty most accurst,
line_2: Till the cram'd Paunch o'er-fill'd with Pressure burst.
Or bid that heart with sorrow burst.

line_1: 'Till the wide waves o'erwhelm the spot accurst,
line_2: 'Loud, and more loud, ye foaming billows burst!

line_1: And heaving earthquakes shook his realms accurst,
line_2: Thus when loud thunders o'er Gomorrah burst,
